data.text: @jkenney If you fully funded all current public hospital operating rooms across the province, the problem would be solved. But that would be public healthcare. We know you don’t want that. We do though!

@jkenney Privatize our healthcare system puts us back years and years Kenney what is the matter with you? People of Alberta don't believe his so-called good intentions, this means that you'll be paying for health care, the rich will get the best care and the poor will get the worst care

@jkenney Albertans need a stronger, more resilient Premier! The health care system certainly needs help, but when you have a Premier who cares more about the bottom dollar then the people………you have a conservative government, need I say more. Vote carefully people
@jkenney I can’t even get a vitamin D test done. Why is that 🤬
@jkenney Did you get rid of the Putin Puppets in your own party yet?  Moscovian Marionettes.. Good job comrade btw. I would vote for my neighbor's cat before I vote for your party ever again.
